info.name: Investment Platform API
info.description:
Complete API collection for the Investment Platform. Includes authentication, user management, wallet, transactions, investments, referrals, payment gateways, support tickets, notifications, admin dashboard, and profit distribution.

Variables:
- {{baseUrl}}: The base URL of the API server (default: http://localhost:3000/v1)
- {{accessToken}}: JWT access token (auto-saved on login/verify)
- {{refreshToken}}: JWT refresh token (auto-saved on login/verify)

item.name: Authentication
item.description: User authentication endpoints including registration, login, email verification, password management, and account deletion.

request.description: Register a new user account. Optionally include a referral code.
Verify user email with the code sent to their email address. On success, tokens are auto-saved to global variables.
Login with email and password. On success, tokens are auto-saved to global variables.
Logout the current user by invalidating the refresh token.
Get new access and refresh tokens using a valid refresh token.
Resend the email verification code to the authenticated user's email.
Send a password reset code to the user's email address.
Reset the user's password using the reset token sent via email.
Change the authenticated user's password. Requires the current password for verification.
Permanently delete the authenticated user's account. Requires password confirmation.

item.name: User Profile
item.description: User profile management endpoints for viewing and updating personal information including profile image upload.

request.description: Get the authenticated user's profile information.
Update the authenticated user's profile. Supports file upload for profile image.

item.name: Wallet
item.description: Wallet management endpoints for viewing balance and wallet statistics.

request.description: Get the authenticated user's wallet details including balance.
Get wallet statistics for the authenticated user.

item.name: Transactions
item.description: Transaction management endpoints for deposits, withdrawals, and admin transaction management including approval/rejection workflow.

request.description: Create a new deposit request. Requires proof image upload, payment gateway ID, and transaction hash.
Create a new withdrawal request. Specify the amount, payment method, gateway, and destination wallet address.
Get the authenticated user's transaction history with pagination and sorting.
Get transaction statistics for the authenticated user.

variable.description: The ID of the transaction to retrieve

request.description: Get details of a specific transaction by its ID.
Admin endpoint to get all transactions across all users with pagination and sorting.
Admin endpoint to get all pending transactions awaiting approval.

variable.description: The ID of the transaction to approve

request.description: Admin endpoint to approve a pending transaction. On approval, the user's wallet balance is updated automatically.

variable.description: The ID of the transaction to reject

request.description: Admin endpoint to reject a pending transaction. A reason must be provided.
